LOAD_ACCESSOR LOAD_ACCESSORmodels.c models.cLOAD_ACCESSOR
#define LOAD_ACCESSOR( type, nbcomp, acc, dst)Value: { \ int n = 0; \ type* buf = (type*)acc->buffer_view->buffer->data+acc->buffer_view->offset/sizeof(type)+acc->offset/sizeof(type); \ for (int k = 0; k < acc->count; k++) {\ for (int l = 0; l < nbcomp; l++) {\ dst[nbcomp*k+l] = buf[n+l];\ }\ n += acc->stride/sizeof(type);\ }\ }
